## Section 32: Color Usage Guide

### 32.1 Color Application Decision Tree

```
Choosing a color?
│
├─ Primary actions / CTAs
│  └─ Blue (Primary-600: #2563eb)
│     - Buttons
│     - Links
│     - Active states
│
├─ Success states
│  └─ Green (Green-400: #4ade80)
│     - Success badges
│     - Checkmarks
│     - Positive indicators
│
├─ Warning states
│  └─ Yellow (Yellow-400: #facc15)
│     - Pending badges
│     - Warning banners
│     - Caution indicators
│
├─ Error states

│
└─ Secondary actions

      - Accent elements
```

### 32.2 Background Color Standards

'bg-white/10 backdrop-blur-lg border border-white/20'  // Default cards

'bg-gradient-to-r from-blue-600 to-blue-500'                  // Primary button
'bg-gradient-to-r from-teal-500 via-blue-500 to-purple-500'  // Progress bar

// Status backgrounds
'bg-green-500/10'   // Success context
'bg-red-500/10'     // Error context
